intro: Nintendo Switch™ Exclusive! An unprecedented alliance of the Demon Lord's daughter, vampires, elves and knights! A fantasy strategy SRPG where bonds matter!
description:
Embark on an epic Medieval Fantasy Chronicle where unique heroes unfold a genuine strategic fantasy RPG world! Characters vividly brought to life through delicate and beautiful illustrations! From Tieris, the Demon Lord's daughter, to an elf who has lived for 300 years, and a knight who rose from assassin to nobility, over 300 heroes and monsters with dramatic backstories await you on the continent of Lorain. In combat, a sophisticated SRPG system that considers terrain, weather, and character affinities will challenge your strategic thinking. The intricate tactics deployed through turn-based grid combat and the spectacular skill performances created by each character's unique special abilities deliver fresh excitement with every battle. Dynamic combat animations and cinematic cutscenes demonstrate the value of a complete masterpiece that transcends simple strategy gaming.

・Intricate tactical combat through turn-based grid battles!
・Unique special abilities and cinematic cutscenes for each character!
・Deep strategic gameplay considering terrain, weather, and unit affinities!
・Diverse classes including vampires, assassins, knights, and mages!
・Infinite possibilities with new strategic combinations every battle!
・Over 100 varied missions and stages!
・Political conflicts amongst seven kingdoms and complex character relationships!
・The journey of the 12th Crusade to save a chaotic era!
・Endless exploration and discovery!
・Continuous character growth and collection rewards!

Experience profound strategic gameplay and the joy of collecting unique characters throughout this vast adventure. For gamers seeking deep strategic RPGs, those who wish to appreciate beautiful character illustrations, and anyone wanting to immerse themselves in moving storylines, Dragon Knights Chronicle offers an extraordinary fantasy journey.

Prologue
Darkness began to spread across the once-peaceful continent of Lorain. In the north, the ancient dragon Ramol awakened, leading chaotic legions southward, whilst Berend Forest grew increasingly poisoned by the Great King Slime's toxins. Each kingdom and city regarded one another with suspicion, waging conflicts over timber harvesting rights, plunging the entire continent into turmoil. Amidst this desperate situation, Ian Randolph, the ambitious young mayor of the free city of Anor, mustered his armies with grand designs, whilst Vampire Duke Carsus broke his 300-year silence to weave new conspiracies.

In this desperate crisis, the Crusade was formed, and remarkable heroes gathered. Elan, hero of the Crusian War, returned from retirement, whilst Tieris, the Demon Lord's daughter, set aside succession disputes to save the world. Eline, an elf who had lived 300 years; Vanphon, who rose from assassin to nobleman; Sespides, who became a vampire from near-death and began anew, along with the loyal knight commander who became a vampire trying to save her. The mysterious dancer Lina, who turned to vigilante work after completing her revenge; the innocent girl Raphe, who joined to earn magic school tuition fees. Hundreds of brave heroes, each with their own dramatic tales, united beneath one banner.

Now begins the grand adventure of these distinctive Dragon Knights. An unprecedented alliance has formed, bringing together vampires and elves, humans and demons. They must overcome their painful pasts to become true companions, purifying corrupted forests, resolving conflicts, and standing against the forces of chaos. When the assassin's cold precision combines with the gladiator's indomitable spirit, the mage's wisdom with the dancer's elegant swordplay, what miracles might unfold? Can these heroes, bound by diverse abilities and deep friendship, restore peace to the continent of Lorain? The curtain rises now on this grand epic tale woven by heroes of unprecedented diversity and charm.
